alert.note: Alert for Kohala; Kona (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued January 15 at 3:14AM HST until January 15 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY FOR NORTH AND WEST FACING SHORES OF NIIHAU KAUAI OAHU AND MOLOKAI...FOR NORTH FACING SHORES OF MAUI...AND FOR WEST FACING SHORES OF THE BIG ISLAND... .A large, long-period northwest swell (310 degrees) will continue to produce elevated surf along most north and west facing shores of the smaller islands through tonight. In addition, the surf will be near the High Surf Advisory threshold along the west facing shores of the Big Island today. ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM HST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Surf will be 5 to 8 feet. * WHERE...West facing shores of the Big Island. * WHEN...Through this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Moderate. Strong breaking waves and strong currents will make swimming dangerous.
info.instruction: Head all advice from ocean safety officials. When in doubt, don`t go out.
